entry.title: Russian Missiles Strike Kyiv Homes
entry.content: The largest Russian missile barrage in weeks hit the Ukrainian capital of Kyiv early Sunday, hours before a Group of Seven meeting convened in Germany to discuss new economic measures to stop Moscow’s invasion.

entry.title: Killing of Jesuit Priests in Mexico Shakes Nation Afflicted by Violence
entry.content: A local cartel boss in one of the most violent areas of Mexico is accused of killing the two priests, says a local attorney general, and then asked a third to hear his confession. “So many killings in Mexico,” said Pope Francis.
